did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
University of Virginia, Student Council, Office Administrative Files
1968-1986
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 4000 items, which are ca. 5 shelf feet.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Virginia, Student Council, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-23/2/4.891, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection is an archival transfer from the Student Council, care of Ms Mary Ferrate, 109 Peabody Hall University of Virginia on 1989 July 17.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Working papers of Council including allocation requests by individual groups, minutes and material regarding Birdwood.

Topics include: Amateur Radio Club, Anthropology Association, Beta Alpha Phi, Black American Law Students Association, Blue Ridge Mountain Rescue Group, Cavalier Pep Band, Corks and Curls, Day Care, Democratic Socialist Club, Echols Scholors, Egyptian Students Association, Food and Transportation, Grass Roots, Hunger Week (and Other Charitable Projects), Jazz Ensemble, Madison House, Parking and Transportation, Safety and Security, Sorority Recognition, United Way Campaign, Volunteer Committee, Wine Taster's Society, Youth Services, and various Appeals and Hearings and Newspaper Clippings.
